text.tspan: Drivers of forest loss in the Brazilian Amazon
Annual forest loss includes permanent conversion of forest to other land uses (deforestation) and temporary forest loss (degradation). This is
Data source: Tyukavina et al. (2017). Types and rates of forest disturbance in Brazilian Legal Amazon, 2000–2013. Science.
